reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 3: FEE PAYABLE TO SMALL CLAIMS COURT REFEREES
reg_info.reg_name_text: FEE PAYABLE TO SMALL CLAIMS COURT REFEREES

content.content: 1. A referee appointed under section 33 of the Courts of Justice Act shall be paid a fee of $17.85 an hour for the performance of duties and functions in accordance with the rules of court. R.R.O 1990, Reg. 3, s. 1; O. Reg. 586/91, s. 1. Français
content.raw_html:
1. A referee appointed under section 33 of the Courts of Justice Act shall be paid a fee of $17.85 an hour for the performance of duties and functions in accordance with the rules of court. R.R.O 1990, Reg. 3, s. 1; O. Reg. 586/91, s. 1.

Français
